description: This file defines the NoteAdapter class for managing and displaying a list of Note objects within a RecyclerView in an Android application. It includes an internal interface for handling note click events, methods for binding data to views, and view holder implementation.

classes.name: NoteAdapter
classes.description: Adapter class for binding a list of notes to a RecyclerView

classes.name: NoteAdapter.NoteViewHolder
classes.description: ViewHolder class for holding references to the note item views

methods.name: NoteAdapter
methods.description: Constructor initializing the adapter with a list of notes and a click listener

methods.name: setNotes
methods.description: Updates the note list and refreshes the RecyclerView

methods.name: onCreateViewHolder
methods.description: Creates a new ViewHolder for a note item

methods.name: onBindViewHolder
methods.description: Binds note data to the ViewHolder, setting title, snippet, and click behavior

methods.name: getItemCount
methods.description: Returns the total number of notes in the list
